title: Apple Watch Series 7 vs Series 6: Is Apple’s newest wearable a worthy upgrade?
content: The Apple Watch Series 7 is available for purchase, but unlike prior years, there aren’t any huge standout sensors or features. Yes, the screen is bigger than the Series 6, but otherwise, the Apple Watch Series 7 isn’t a huge upgrade over its predecessor. That just means you have some time to take a close […]
